textBeforeTable: The table below looks at the demand and provides a guide to the average salaries quoted in IT jobs citing Greenplum within the UK over the 3 months to 3 August 2015. The 'Rank Change' column provides an indication of the change in demand within each location based on the same 3 month period last year. Greenplum Top 11 Job Locations This chart provides a salary histogram for IT jobs citing Greenplum over the 3 months to 3 August 2015 within the UK. Greenplum Salary Histogram This chart provides the 3-month moving average for salaries quoted in permanent IT jobs citing Greenplum within the UK. Greenplum Salary Trend This chart provides the 3-month moving total of permanent IT jobs citing Greenplum within the UK as a proportion of the total demand within the Vendors category. textAfterTable: Greenplum Top 30 Related IT Skills For the 6 months to 3 August 2015, IT jobs within the UK citing Greenplum also mentioned the following IT skills in order of popularity. The figures indicate the number of jobs and their proportion against the total number of IT job ads sampled that cited Greenplum. 1 79 (80.61%) Oracle 2 75 (76.53%) Hadoop 3 72 (73.47%) Big Data 4 67 (68.37%) Analytics 5 66 (67.35%) Java 6 65 (66.33%) ETL 7 60 (61.22%) SQL 8 58 (59.18%) Teradata 9 57 (58.16%) Python 10 55 (56.12%) Linux 11 54 (55.10%) Business Intelligence 12 53 (54.08%) Analytical Skills 13 51 (52.04%) Vertica 13 51 (52.04%) Netezza
